Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.provisioners

Class Summary
BwProvisioner BwProvisioner is an abstract class that represents the provisioning policy of bandwidth to virtual machines inside a Host.
BwProvisionerSimple BwProvisionerSimple is a class that implements a simple best effort allocation policy: if there is bw available to request, it allocates; otherwise, it fails.
PeProvisioner The Class PeProvisioner.
PeProvisionerSimple The Class PeProvisionerSimple.
RamProvisioner RamProvisioner is an abstract class that represents the provisioning policy of memory to virtual machines inside a Host.
RamProvisionerSimple RamProvisionerSimple is an extension of RamProvisioner which uses a best-effort policy to allocate memory to a VM.
